name: With Friends
description:
For the GDK Spring  2021 Game Jam!

You're new in town and miss raiding dungeons! Bring a friend and clear the dungeon!

Producer: Sebastian Saavedra
Programmers: Sebastian Saavedra, Nicholas Hussian, Nathan Otis, Justin Moy
Level Designers:, Nicholas Hussian, Nathan Otis, Justin Moy, Gabriel Fernandez
Artists: Meaghan Archer, Jim Elso
Music: Josh Ambrocio
Sound Designer: Gabriel Fernandez
